name: The Hive - Simulation of the Honeycomb Maze
name_original: The Hive - Simulation of the Honeycomb Maze
description:
This maze requires exceptional spatial navigation.

     This puzzle game is a recreation of the honeycomb maze. It is challenging because of its special hexagonal shape in which you will easily lose your sense of direction of the North, South, West, and East.  Moreover, you can see in the blue map those tricky loops and external lines I designed to misdirect you into other area.

     I made this maze simpler by implementing a minimap so that you can use the trophy as a reference point to locate where you are in the map. However, if you intend to try what it will feel like in real life, you can press "M" to disable the minimap or wait till the second completion since the game will automatically disable it for you.

Some interesting facts

This is a honeycomb maze design in real life.

in a TV Show, someone actually challenges this maze, blindfolded, and successfully escaped, which was so shocking to me that inspires me to create this game. 

This game is made with Unity, hope you will like it!
